title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: ‚ö†Ô∏èNOBODY TRUST THIS!!!‚úÖBITCOIN WILL MAKE YOU WRONG AGAIN!!!!!!üí∞ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JBHRInH-T8c

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: My advise is not to rely on only the stuffs that you watch on YouTube and trade it. Always try to check on your analysis also before you pull your trigger. Don't trade blindly it is not trade worthy, you can do your comparative analysis, review your position properly and then take your trade decision. It is not gamble so don't gamble with your trade with every video you see.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: is the video on youtube yours?and hope you will get more people who will see your video by posting that link here. or you just share someone else's video. (I did not open your link).you can share screenshots and results of your analysis in detail with structured explanations.You better share video links like that on social media or your telegram channel, if you have one.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I have not watched the video because I know you are looking for views using the stupid clickbaits. If you want to post analysis or your ideas here, then go ahead and post screenshots of your analysis from trading view charts here too if you want proper engagement.Ain't no way we are going to waste time watching trashy YouTube videos with ads and requests to using up in certain crypto exchanges using the author's referral links.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: I am sorry i am not going to click on the link neither will i watch the video. youtube Video on analysis no matter who made them is subject to your own cross check and reviews. I don't depend on the analysis of a so-called or self claimed market expert make my trading decisions. I try to analyse for myself and when it works i smile, if it goes negative i wait to make correction the next time i analyse.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Those that have YouTube videos or channels to share, should be aware that not everyone is going to click a link here unless they care to explain more of a summary of that video.If it's interesting and there are information and there's the analysis that catches the attention of everyone, it is for sure going to take views from everybody but not in a clickbaity way.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: If you‚Äôre the creator of that analysis, why not explain it here instead of posting a link, you can‚Äôt force everyone here to watch your video analysis because for sure its just like the others. Trading is not easy, and having your own analysis is still advisable, the market right now might still correct but eventually it will break all the resistance and go to the moon again, time can tell so better to be prepared and trade wisely.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: crzy on January 14, 2023, 09:49:15 PMIf you‚Äôre the creator of that analysis, why not explain it here instead of posting a link, you can‚Äôt force everyone here to watch your video analysis because for sure its just like the others. Trading is not easy, and having your own analysis is still advisable, the market right now might still correct but eventually it will break all the resistance and go to the moon again, time can tell so better to be prepared and trade wisely. ^ I suspected that OP was trying to gain more views from us here for those who are clicking the link, I did not click anything which I think is not unless OP gives more insight about it. There is no real analysis except a prediction or speculation of the price which is the same as how we predict the market price. @OP, prove your self first, instead of posting this video link, try to create content that has an accurate result of your analysis, in that way, probably many members here will convince of your analysis.

comments.author: Bitcoin_people
comments.body: I think we should not waste time watching videos unnecessarily. Because we have different bitcoin analysis topics here and there are big developers who do analysis on bitcoin. Here's a look at those posts to get an idea of ‚Äã‚Äãwhat the future of Bitcoin might look like. Bitcoin can never be analyzed by watching videos I think seniors in our forum will give good idea to get an idea about the market. If you want to know about Bitcoin right now, you need to visit different sites and gain good knowledge about Bitcoin Analysis

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: Alisha-k on January 14, 2023, 08:37:17 PMI am sorry i am not going to click on the link neither will i watch the video. youtube Video on analysis no matter who made them is subject to your own cross check and reviews. I don't depend on the analysis of a so-called or self claimed market expert make my trading decisions. I try to analyse for myself and when it works i smile, if it goes negative i wait to make correction the next time i analyse.This is the best strategy to use your own analysis to take entry and exit decision for trading in Bitcoin or alts market, instead of relying on someone else, who will never help you for free. If you learn to use RSI & MACD indicators and gain some basic knowledge about, "how to use risk/money management tools", then you can start trading, but in the beginning, trade in spot market & avoid taking position in margin or future markets which are very risky.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_people on January 15, 2023, 02:31:08 AMI think we should not waste time watching videos unnecessarily. Because we have different bitcoin analysis topics here and there are big developers who do analysis on bitcoin. Here's a look at those posts to get an idea of ‚Äã‚Äãwhat the future of Bitcoin might look like. Bitcoin can never be analyzed by watching videos I think seniors in our forum will give good idea to get an idea about the market. If you want to know about Bitcoin right now, you need to visit different sites and gain good knowledge about Bitcoin AnalysisI didn't see the video from Youtube because it can affect our analysis of the movement of bitcoin. We should analyze it ourselves and not be too influenced by the analysis of other people so we can analyze it well. We can indeed watch videos on Youtube to add to our insights about how to analyze bitcoin movements, but we also have to do the analysis ourselves so we can improve our skills. That's the important thing we have to do because then, we won't depend on other people's analysis and can also improve our skills.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on January 14, 2023, 07:58:26 PMI have not watched the video because I know you are looking for views using the stupid clickbaits. If you want to post analysis or your ideas here, then go ahead and post screenshots of your analysis from trading view charts here too if you want proper engagement.Ain't no way we are going to waste time watching trashy YouTube videos with ads and requests to using up in certain crypto exchanges using the author's referral links.Exactly what I think too. Why redirect users to something that could easily have been explained here. I'm mindful of clicks this day because of malware, not even because it's a bait to make OP money. OP should put up a different method which must include an option of analysis of whatever that's contained in their shared video links. The video angle should be optional for those who care to watch.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on January 13, 2023, 10:11:11 AM‚ö†Ô∏èNOBODY TRUST THIS!!!‚úÖBITCOIN WILL MAKE YOU WRONG AGAIN!!!!!!üí∞ BTC analysis todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JBHRInH-T8cI just opened the youtube link but it was muted and when I saw the theme of the video I immediately closed it, because we all as individuals have our analysis about bitcoin.In short, the analysis of each trader here in the crypto business industry is not the same. Rather than believing in such an analysis on YouTube, it is better to believe our analysis unless the one who analyzed is known and trusted by us.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Crypto related content on youtube has been losing credibility with enthusiasts after many being scammed or lured into scams by coaches, experts, specialists and advisors, in exchange for comissions, which is quite common once youtubers gain notoriety with a decent number of subscribers on their channels and many views.I hope this is not the case of OP and that he has genuine intentions when creating his content, but it would be great to talk about the stuff presented on the video with written words and images here, since we are at a Bitcoin forum, and not a videos' platform...

comments.author: maria1110
comments.body: Bitcoin is a day away from matching a nearly 10-year-old record

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on January 17, 2023, 10:30:10 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on January 14, 2023, 07:58:26 PMI have not watched the video because I know you are looking for views using the stupid clickbaits. If you want to post analysis or your ideas here, then go ahead and post screenshots of your analysis from trading view charts here too if you want proper engagement.Ain't no way we are going to waste time watching trashy YouTube videos with ads and requests to using up in certain crypto exchanges using the author's referral links.Exactly what I think too. OP should put up a different method which must include an option of analysis of whatever that's contained in their shared video links. The video angle should be optional for those who care to watch. I think youtube views only counts once you finished the whole video, so it's not wrong to just check it out only to see if it's really a clickbait or not. So I did check it and I see that it is truly an analysis about the BTC price but it was still up to you guys if you will believe on what the youtuber is saying or not.BTC analyses are everywhere and mostly here in the forum because it was a bitcoin forum but there might be some differences on the analysis that we are seeing. Other than the video, maybe the OP can just post pictures here like what other traders are doing. And then he should provide some technical explanations since many people don't like to click on links.

Quoteyou can share screenshots and results of your analysis in detail with structured explanations.You better share video links like that on social media or your telegram channel, if you have one.I have not clicked on the link also because I am very conscious this time on how I click on links to avoid unnecessary drama.
